Title: Authorizes the issuance of a temporary retail permit by the state liquor authority to licensees located in a municipality having a population of one million or more persons
Summary: Authorizes the issuance of a temporary retail permit by the state liquor authority to licensees located in a municipality having a population of one million or more persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to authorizing the issuance of a temporary retail permit by the state liquor authority to licensees located in a municipality having a population of one million or more persons
